import React from 'react' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { removeItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import { createStructuredSelector } from ' reselect' import { selectCartItems } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem: {name, imageUrl, price, quantity}, removeItem }) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
removeItem(cartItem)}>✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ removeItem: cartItem => dispatch(removeItem(cartItem)) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
